item.title: Jako Leisure Jacket Performance Ladies

item.description: Jako Leisure Jacket Performance Ladies The leisure jacket of the Jako Performance line is fully equipped with features. The zipper garage protects your chin. The mesh lining ensures good ventilation and the side pockets with zipper ensure that you do not lose anything. Thin microfibers transport the perspiration immediately to the outside. As a result, […]
item.content:encoded:
Jako Leisure Jacket Performance Ladies

The leisure jacket of the Jako Performance line is fully equipped with features. The zipper garage protects your chin. The mesh lining ensures good ventilation and the side pockets with zipper ensure that you do not lose anything.

Thin microfibers transport the perspiration immediately to the outside. As a result, the material dries very quickly, protects against the cold and gives a pleasant body feeling during exercise.

Features and benefits
– Quick drying material
– Zipper garage
– Side pockets with zipper closure

Color: Blue / White / Navy
SKU: 9897-49

item.title: MC David Hex Goalkeeper Shirt LS ”Extre”
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: MC David Hex Goalkeeper Shirt LS ”Extre MC David Hex Goalkeeper Shirt LS ”Extreme II” Pro style long sleeve compression shirt with Hex™s protecting side ribs, arms and shoulders. Conforms to and stretches with your body for continuous protection. Ultra hDc™ moisture management technology for heat control, comfort and protection. Color: SKU: 7737R
item.content:encoded:
MC David Hex Goalkeeper Shirt LS ”Extre

MC David Hex Goalkeeper Shirt LS ”Extreme II”

Pro style long sleeve compression shirt with Hexs protecting side ribs, arms and shoulders. Conforms to and stretches with your body for continuous protection. Ultra hDc moisture management technology for heat control, comfort and protection.

Color:
SKU: 7737R

item.title: Hummel Spirit Training Set Women
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Hummel Spirit Training Set Women The Spirit training set by Hummel is made of soft polyester and the ClimaTec finish makes this training set sweat-proof. The comfortable fabric and sporty fit are an ideal combination during your practice. The shirt has a stylish, geometric print on the front and contains contrasting panels on the shoulders […]
item.content:encoded:
Hummel Spirit Training Set Women

The Spirit training set by Hummel is made of soft polyester and the ClimaTec finish makes this training set sweat-proof. The comfortable fabric and sporty fit are an ideal combination during your practice. The shirt has a stylish, geometric print on the front and contains contrasting panels on the shoulders and arms.

Features and benefits
– Shorts with elastic waistband and drawstring
– Female fit

Color: Pink / Black
SKU: 114602-3130

item.title: Salming Diamond Game Shirt Women

item.description: Salming Diamond Game Shirt Women Salming Diamond tee is made in a flexibel and functional Coolfeel fabric. The female fit and sober design with embossed raglansleeves will make you feel and look like a winner in every match. Features and benefits – Fit: Regular – Fabric: 100% Polyester Color: Black SKU: 1198736-0101
item.content:encoded:
Salming Diamond Game Shirt Women

item.title: Nike Air Zoom Hyperace
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Technical and lightweight indoor shoe with perfect damping.
item.content:encoded:
Product Description

Nike Air Zoom Hyperace 2 Men

The Nike Air Zoom Hyperace 2 is a technical and lightweight indoor shoe with perfect damping. By using the right colors combined with the Nike logo, this shoe has a sharp and sporty appearance.

Features and benefits
– TPU heelcounter provides enough comfort and firmness
– Made with small, self-breathing holes that keep your feet cool, dry and active
– The forefoot has some sort of airbag that gives an even better feeling while turning or moving quickly
– The back of the shoe fits sporty to the heel and won’t let you slide

Color: White / Black
SKU: AR5281-101

item.content:encoded:
Product Description

Nike Air Zoom Hyperace 2 Men

The Nike Air Zoom Hyperace 2 is a technical and lightweight indoor shoe with perfect damping. By using the right colors combined with the Nike logo, this shoe has a sharp and sporty appearance.

Features and benefits
– TPU heelcounter provides enough comfort and firmness
– Made with small, self-breathing holes that keep your feet cool, dry and active
– The forefoot has some sort of airbag that gives an even better feeling while turning or moving quickly
– The back of the shoe fits sporty to the heel and won’t let you slide

Color: White / Black
SKU: AR5281-101
